hi and welcome you listening to the x-22

1313 a and today's date is June 22nd
2017 and the title of the episode is the
bed is now preparing for the next
economic crisis here's how let's get
into the economic collapse financial
news now we are seeing one retailer
after another completely collapse on
itself and it's not slowing up and we
see that as we move throughout this year
it's going to get a lot worse and this
holiday season it's not going to get any
better we're going to see most likely
after this holiday season a lot more

lot of commercial real estate strip
malls will be completely empty moles
will be empty and we're going to have
major problems now Sears in Canada they
announced that they're going bankrupt
they're going to be letting go around
3,000 people and we can see already that
these individuals going to have a very
difficult time trying to find work now
we can see at this point that Sears most
likely will cease to exist as we move
throughout these coming months and a lot
of other stores which we've known for a
very long time they don't exist anymore
now we realize that the economy is
breaking down very very quickly
everywhere we look we see things
accelerating to the downside and we were
looking at home Capital Group this is up
in Canada where they were having major
major problems where they had the liar
loans they were basically imploding on
themselves and depositors were taking
their funds out of the financial
institution and many people thought okay
this is going to be the first sign it's
going to have a domino effect it will
start affecting other financial
institutions and this will be a council
getting effect now something very
interesting just happen Warren Buffett
he came in and he quired acquired 38.4%
of home Capital Group and he's providing
around two billion dollars worth of
loans now the question is
why is he doing this why did Warren
Buffett indirectly acquire 300 million
dollars of the firm shares in a private
placement through its Columbia Insurance
unit why did he do this
well we can see that there were many
many problems with home Capital Group
where the company was in a cross has for
peddling liar loans last week home
capital reached around thirty point five
million settlement with Ontario
Securities Commission settled a
class-action lawsuit and accepted
responsibility for misleading investors
about problems with his mortgage
underwriting procedures in April it was
accused of misleading shareholders on
mortgage fraud which sent it shares
tumbling and once that happened it
sparked withdrawals and threatened to
disrupt Canada's real estate sector so
Warren Buffett stepped in he decided to
acquire a portion of this company and
the reason for this is because they knew
if no one did anything this would start
the chain reaction and the economy
throughout Canada the u.s. the rest of
the world would all start coming down
think about 2006 2007 2008 what other
companies were there problems with bear
stearns comes to mind where they stepped
in and they tried to save it does this
not look very familiar to that point in
time we're seeing very similar things
happen once again and the reason why
we're seeing this is because they're
trying to hold off the entire system
from coming down that's why they're
doing this now when we look at junk
bonds junk bonds right now they are
signaling that the great global debt
binge well it's coming to an end now the
market has gone absolutely nowhere for
about what 15 weeks now meanwhile
against the backdrop
you can see the credit markets are
flashing major warning signs junk bonds
have broken their bull market trend line
for from the 216 bottom this is a major
warning that the markets are switching
into risk off mode and what we're
looking at right now it looks like that
the central bank driven credit bubble
from 2009 well it looks like it is now
ending and we can see from everything
the Fed has been doing that things are
rapidly coming to an end here and it
looks like the Fed is preparing for the
next economic crisis now everything that
we've been looking at shows us that
we're in this recession right now I mean
we have weak data all over the place we
can see with our own two eyes how things
are rapidly deteriorating and we know
that the Fed is raising the interest
rates now they also mention that will be
unwinding their balance sheet now we
need to think about this for a second
they bought up all that toxic real
estate back in 2009 2010 2011 they also
had stimulus to pump up the markets once
again and they've been holding this
toxic real estate while at the same time
they've been pumping up the real estate
bubbles now let's think about this for a
second they've been pumping up the
bubbles getting the prices on homes to
move up to make it seem like the real
estate market was strong now remember
they're holding all this toxic real
estate and the value of this continually
Rises which means there is going to come
a point where they can say let's get rid
of it right now and here we are right
now now why do they pick this time to do
it well we're at the top of the bubbles
they can unload this now people will buy
it people will say yes give me this I
will take it now why are they doing this
they are doing this because they're
getting ready for the next round of this
entire market
collapse scenario they're cleaning out
as much as they possibly can so they can
take on more they're raising interest
rates to basically start the chain
reaction we have Warren Buffett
purchasing shares in this mortgage
company which basically was collapsing
now he's stopping it the Fed is now
maneuvering to get all of this off of
their balance sheet now they need to do
this because once the system starts to
come down and it drops dramatically what
are they going to have to do well these
housing prices these bubbles they're
going to pop and there's going to be a
lot more toxic real estate and they can
take what they have and basically go out
to the banks and purchase them up once
again they can start stimulus once again
to prop up the markets this is what
we've been talking about where they have
been planning this for a very long time
where this is going to be a stew stage
type of collapse now the first stage
which we talked about they're going to
let the markets go they're going to let
the bubbles pop now remember they've
always said that they they can't decide
if there's a bubble or not a bubble they
have no tools to detect us but we know
for a fact they're the ones who create
all of these bubbles they do it on
purpose they know exactly when they're
going to pop because they do it
everything is completely controlled by
them it's really not a surprise and we
can see that they're prepared and ready
to bring it down this is what they're
getting ready to do now the first stage
is where they're going to say okay look
it's maybe being blamed on Trump let's
just use that as an example where he is

not all the way part of the way and it's
going to allow the Fed to step in now
most likely they'll not raise rates any
more they're going to say they're going
to have to lower them back down because
there's no way that they can raise rates
when this is all happening they're going
to say we're going to try some stimulus
they're not going to go full they're not
going to go full throttle with stimulus
right away they're going to say let's
start off slowly we're going to add some

to help the banks out right now because
we can see that a lot of the real estate
that they owned
well it's dropping very quickly now
they're not going to do this right away
of course they're going to wait a little
while until they step in and say let's

which again then we'll create another
bubble which will pump the market up
once again now how high can they pump

this time it's going to go absolutely
nowhere they know this already they
already know that they'll have a small

the corporate media the Fed they're

we're going to try to control this
inflation and this is exactly what
they're going to try to we're going to
see a lot of people losing their jobs a

is going to be all part of the first

let's do this and as we go throughout

we're going to see this have in effect

they're going to need that event to

this will allow them to blame this on

this is what they're setting this up to
be this is what they're preparing for
they're not doing it because oh it's in

we're doing it to help everyone get a

this is a private corporation that only
